name: Switch, Shoot, & Jump
description:
Story:

You are that little dude with a gun, you have the ability to switch the background color from dark to light or vise versa. You can use your switching ability to uncover new traps, but, it'll cover the old ones. This game tests your memorization and idea skills to increase your mental capacity. Also, you are being scored by Cthulu.

Controls:
  • Left & Right Arrows - Move
  • Up Arrow - Jump
  • Down Arrow - Shoot & Switch

Switch, Shoot, & Jump is a short game made for the Nokia 3310 Jam 3.
